name: Vikram Ghule
subject: Physics
bio: 17 years of experience in teaching Physics to NEET & JEE aspirants. Specializes in mechanics, thermodynamics, and modern physics. Known for breaking down complex concepts into simple, understandable parts.
achievements: Former HOD at prestigious engineering college

name: Prachi Ghule
subject: Mathematics
bio: 7 years of experience in Mathematics education. Expert in calculus, algebra, and trigonometry. Focuses on building strong mathematical foundations and problem-solving skills.

name: Minal Patil
subject: Chemistry
bio: 12 years of experience in Chemistry education. Specializes in organic chemistry, physical chemistry, and analytical chemistry. Known for making chemistry concepts memorable through practical examples.

name: Asawari Hire
subject: Biology
bio: 8 years of experience in Biology education. Specializes in human physiology, genetics, and ecology. Focuses on NEET-specific biology preparation with emphasis on diagrams and concepts.

name: Ram Solanke
subject: Biology
bio: 6 years of experience in Biology education. Expert in microbiology, cell biology, and plant physiology. Known for his innovative teaching methods and practical approach.

name: Kishor Jadhav
subject: Mathematics
bio: 6 years of experience in Mathematics education. Specializes in calculus, coordinate geometry, and statistics. Focuses on building logical thinking and mathematical intuition.

name: Dr. Shradha Dandnaik
subject: Bio-NEET
bio: 4 years of experience in Biology education with medical background. Specializes in human anatomy, physiology, and medical terminology. Provides unique medical perspective to biology concepts.

name: Dr. Amit Deshmukh
subject: Physics
bio: 15 years of experience in Physics education. Specializes in electromagnetism, optics, and quantum physics. Known for his research-oriented approach and deep conceptual understanding.

name: Sneha Kulkarni
subject: Chemistry
bio: 10 years of experience in Chemistry education. Specializes in inorganic chemistry, coordination chemistry, and chemical bonding. Focuses on conceptual clarity and numerical problem solving.

name: Rahul More
subject: Mathematics
bio: 8 years of experience in Mathematics education. Specializes in algebra, trigonometry, and probability. Known for his systematic approach and emphasis on fundamentals.

name: Dr. Priyanka Singh
subject: Biology
bio: 12 years of experience in Biology education with medical background. Specializes in human anatomy, pathology, and medical biology. Provides clinical perspective to biological concepts.

name: Vikrant Pawar
subject: Physics
bio: 9 years of experience in Physics education. Specializes in mechanics, waves, and modern physics. Known for his practical demonstrations and real-world applications.
